summary: A simple recolor of the mosaic in Kynareth Temple in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
What is it?
A simple recolor of the mosaic in Kynareth Temple in Whiterun. I hated the way the beautiful mosaic was so washed out and bland. I changed the saturation to make it pop out more, and rotated the picture so the bird would point at the shrine. Changed the bird to white.

Changes -
The primary file now has the normal map that matches the rotated texture as requested.

How to install?
Unzip the file into your Skyrim folder. When asked to overwrite click yes.
How to uninstall?
Delete "wrtemplekynarethmosaic.dds" and "wrtemplekynarethmosaic_n.dds" under data>textures>architecture>whiterun.

Permissions: Do not upload this anywhere for monetary gain. This mod is NOT for sale. Â
author: wannsa
